headline: Nearly 66% of Warren Buffett's Portfolio Is Invested in These 5 Stocks as 2025 Begins
summary: With Berkshire Hathaway delivering an average annual return of around 19.8% over almost six decades, Buffett clearly knows what he's doing.  Unsurprisingly, he hasn't diversified Berkshire's holdings as much as most investors would.  Nearly 66% of Buffett's portfolio is invested in these five stocks as 2025 begins.
